CustomField.description: [DrawLoop]: Used in WF Outbound Message [Task 11630] DDP = License Face Certificate ; Delivery = SMTP - ODJFS COC Approved & SMTP - ODE COC Approved
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "FCC - Type A Home",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "FCC - Type B Home",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "Child Care Center") , "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgn9", IF( OR(CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "Pre School",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "School Age Child Care") , "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgn8", "") )
CustomField.label: Drawloop_Next COC Approved
